message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $180. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $150 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $180 is already a competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I would like to counter with $160 for the product. I hope this is acceptable.
